local_intent: Ensure t_block is visible, perform fine ApproachAndAlign with retries, then verify arrival at the block.
assumptions: t_block location is valid for IsAt verification
Scanning can restore visibility if lost
coherence_with_global: Reflects perceive-then-approach flow of GLOBAL_BT; uses ApproachAndAlign with same parameters and verifies with IsAt without altering yaw, consistent with later yaw-setting steps.
